item.description:
October Camp 'n Pack

hosted by

the Alaskan Malamute Rescue of New England!

http://www.amrone.org/events/campnpack/index.html

Not only is this dog-friendly camping; this is a camping trip designed just for you & your dog(s)!

October 5th, 6th, 7th and the 8th, 2012 (4 days this year!)!!

Camp Timber Trails
Tolland, MA

All Breeds Welcome!

~~~Who runs the activities at camp?~~~

Camp N Pack is special because every single workshop leader has volunteered to run their activity or do their presentation. We are lucky to have such expertise and such wonderful people that will give of their time to help us put on this weekend. This year we are offering a variety of great activities.

~~~What kinds of activities happen at Camp?~~~

Past activities have included:
Our annual 10 mile qualifying hike
Campfires
Star gazing walks
Agility- try its, games, run thrus, workshops
Rally O- try its, games, run thrus, workshops
Weight Pulling- try its, run thrus, workshops
Open Weight Pulling Competition
Walking Nicely on a Leash
Massage for your dog
TTouch
Letterboxing
Packing with your dog
Dog sledding
Skijouring/ Bikejouring
Talks given by vets including: thyroid problems, hip dysplasia, alternative medicine and       feeding your dogs
Natural Foods
Canine Good Citizenship Testing
Reiki
Carting/Drafting
Doggie Games
Free Play area set up for the dogs
Do it yourself walk
Hikes around camp
Cranio sacrial workshop
Dog crafts

~~~What is the typical Camp N Pack Schedule?~~~

This year's schedule of events will be finalized just before the weekend. A typical camp schedule might look something like this:

Typical Camp N Pack Schedule:

Friday's Events:
9:30 am - 3:00 pm 10 mile hike
3:00 pm - 9:00 pm Check-in
6:00 pm - 7:30 pm Dinner
8:30 pm Campfire
9:00 pm Night Walk

Saturday's Events:
8:00 am - 9:00 am Breakfast
9:15 am - 10:00 am
10:00 am - 10:45 am
11:00 am - 11:45 am
Beginner Agility Try Its
Beg/Int Agility Try Its
Int/Adv Agility Try Its
11:00 am - 12:00 pm
Walking nicely on a leash
Massage for your dog
Letterboxing; Get Ready for a new Adventure!
TTouch for your dog
12:00 pm - 12:30 pm Lunch
12:30 pm Silent Auction
2:00 pm - 3:00 pm Guest Speaker
4:00 pm - 5:00 pm Weight Pull Try Its
3:00 pm - 4:00 pm Letterboxing-Let's go find one, or two or maybe all six!
3:00 pm - 4:00 pm Weight Pull Workshop
4:00 pm - 5:00 pm Rally O Workshop
6:00 pm Social Hour
6:30 pm Saturday Banquet
7:15 pm Make your own Sundae's
Raffle ends and winners posted!

Sunday's Events:
8:00 am - 9:00 am Breakfast
9:00 am - 10:00 am CGC Testing
9:00 am - 10:00 am Reiki
9:00 am - 10:00 am Carting/Drafting
10:00 am - 12:00 pm Agility Games
10:00 am - 12:00 pm Doggie Games
12:00 pm - 1:00 pm Lunch
After Lunch Pick up and Pack up

***Note: the website to this event is not working properly, but here is the working link to the registration form w/prices: http://www.amrone.org/events/campnpack/campnpack2012_reg.pdf

***For your GPS: Camp Timber Trails, 1266 East Otis Road, Tolland, MA 01034. Contact phone listed: (413) 258-4592
item.name: Camp 'n Pack hosted by Alaskan Malamute Rescue of New England!
